step.step_desc: If org.test.foo exists in usecase-apptools-tests/tools/ directory, remove it. Then run below commands under usecase-apptools-tests/tools/ directory: On Android: $ crosswalk-app create org.test.foo $ cd org.test.foo $ crosswalk-app build On Windows: $ node crosswalk-app create org.test.foo $ cd org.test.foo $ node crosswalk-app build
Install x86 foo app on your android device which is "x86" architecture
Check icon of foo app in your android device
Launch foo app in your android device
Check the homepage of foo app
step.expected: You can see "This is a Crosswalk Sample Application" on the device

step.step_desc: Uninstall the app when it is running
Install and launch the foo app again. Close foo app via clicking the home button, and kill foo app from Task Manager
Long press the icon of foo app to uninstall it
